awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 14 wins & 8 nominations.

fullplot: A career bank robber busts out of jail (Clooney) with the help of his buddy (Rhames) and kidnaps a US Marshal (Lopez) in the process. When the two cons head for Detroit to pull off their final big scam, the Marshal is put on their case but she finds she is attracted to one of them and has second thoughts about bringing them in.
plot: A career bank robber breaks out of jail and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a US Marshall he has kidnapped.
title: Out of Sight

tomatoes.consensus: Steven Soderbergh's intelligently crafted adaptation of the Elmore Leonard novel is witty, sexy, suprisingly entertaining, and a star-making turn for George Clooney.
